data.title: The Future Begins Here
data.meta_description: Intel Labs is a global research organization that innovates to deliver transformative solutions for every person on the planet.
data.text:
We Seek Answers to Challenging Questions

Our expansive research scope empowers us to identify and explore exciting opportunities and discover novel approaches to the biggest technical challenges of our time across computing, connectivity, cloud-to-edge infrastructure, and artificial intelligence.

Security and Privacy

Collaborating with academia, government, and industry to identify, prioritize, and proactively develop solutions that help protect data and workloads from future security risks.

Learn more

We Solve Problems in New and Unexpected Ways

Intel Labs employs over 700 world-class engineers, computer scientists, physicists, neuroscientists, and anthropologists who work in more than 30 technical disciplines. Our global team collaborates across fields to create a positive and lasting impact for everyone, everywhere.

Learn about our team

We Scale Solutions through Global Collaboration

Intel is a leading proponent of open collaboration. From investing approximately $100 million a year in university research programs to partnering with the US National Science Foundation (NSF) and the Semiconductor Research Corporation, we believe the best way to drive breakthrough innovation is by engaging with industry, government, and academic researchers from around the world.

Explore our research programs and partnerships
